name: Noelle
desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

value.name: I Got Your Back
value.desc:
Noelle: I Got Your Back

A stout heart is the sternest armor.

value.text: Reward for inviting Noelle to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Noelle
value.desc: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Full Plate</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Full Plate</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
Grant 2 <color=#ffffff>Shield points</color> to your active character.
Before this <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> is fully consumed, the <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> you take is halved.
(The figure will be rounded up)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Sweeping Time</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Sweeping Time</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
When your character uses a Normal Attack: Consume 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)
Character's <color=#ffffff>Normal Attacks</color> deal +2 DMG and their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt is converted to <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I'm not very good at this, but I'll give it my all!"
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Noelle's deck specializes in using healing and protection abilities to gain a resource advantage, while relying on enhancing Noelle's Normal Attacks for offense.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

customize.name: I Got Your Back
customize.desc:
Noelle: I Got Your Back

A stout heart is the sternest armor.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: I Got Your Back
customize.desc:
Noelle: I Got Your Back

A stout heart is the sternest armor.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I'm fully prepared this time. I'll show you how much I've improved!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Noelle" starts with the Talent Card "I Got Your Back" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
